alert.note: Alert for Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued January 25 at 6:37AM CST until January 25 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 30 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 11 AM EST THIS MORNING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN ALABAMA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN SOUTHEAST ALABAMA HOUSTON IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 6 COUNTIES IN BIG BEND FLORIDA FRANKLIN LIBERTY IN PANHANDLE FLORIDA BAY CALHOUN GULF JACKSON THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ABE SPRINGS, APALACHICOLA, BAY CITY, BENNETT, BEVERLY, BLOUNTSTOWN, BROWNTOWN, BUCK SIDING, CAIRO, CALLAWAY, CARRABELLE, CLARKSVILLE, COTTONWOOD, DALKEITH, DOTHAN, DURHAM, ECONFINA, FORT GADSDEN, FRINK, GRACEVILLE, HONEYVILLE, HOWARD CREEK, LYNN HAVEN, MALONE, MARIANNA, MARYSVILLE, NIXON, OAK GROVE, ODENA, PANAMA CITY, PORT ST. JOE, RICHTER CROSSROADS, SCOTTS FERRY, SIMSVILLE, SNEADS, SWEETWATER, TILTON, WEWAHITCHKA, AND WHITE CITY.
